hibernate-mapping.query: select i from Item i where i.itemId = ?
select i from Item i where i.itemName = ?
select i from Item i where i.itemServiceDetails.sysCreationDate = ?
select i.itemName from Item i where i.itemId = ?
select i.raritanAssetTag from Item i where i.itemId = ?
select i.isAssetTagVerified from Item i where i.itemId = ?
select distinct i from Item i inner join i.parentItem p where p.itemId = ?
select distinct count(*) from Item i inner join i.parentItem p where p.itemId = ?
select distinct i from Item i inner join i.parentItem p inner join i.classLookup c where p.itemId = ? and c.lkpValueCode = ?
select m from MeItem m inner join m.classLookup c inner join m.dataCenterLocation l inner join m.powerPorts p where c.lkpValueCode = ? order by l.code, m.itemName
select i from ItItem i left outer join i.facingLookup l where i.bladeChassis.itemId = ? order by l.lksId, i.slotPosition asc
select distinct count(*) from Item i inner join i.parentItem p inner join i.classLookup c where p.itemId = ? and c.lkpValueCode = ?
select i from Item i where i.piqId = ? and dataCenterLocation.applicationSetting.value = ? and dataCenterLocation.applicationSetting.lksData.lkpValueCode = ?
